subject: Hello sir,
body:
Hello sir,
I am a financial agent that works with bankers and politicians including their personal assistance in Africa.There's a huge business opportunity that needs a very urgent attention if you are competent and trustworthy.
There are deposits in different financial institutions across the globe including the Arab nations lying fallow for investments.Kindly get back to me if you are interested for further details.
Rgds,
Dr.Resendiz Sergio.

subject: Re:   Hello sir,
body:
Dear Sergio,

Thank you for your message. I am interested in hearing more about these business opportunities. Could you please provide me with more details?

Best wishes,
Elizabeth

subject: Re: Hello sir,
body:
Sir
Thank you for your email.I want to assure you that every instruction from
the ECOWAS and modalities for your payment have already been concluded and
all your pains in the past as a result of this transaction will turn into a
thing of joy any moment from now.Therefore you need to follow your
transaction up right away because we are not going to give a second chance
for another approval if you miss it now.

Meanwhile There's an urgent need for you to follow this payment up as soon
as the bank is ready to pay you without wasting time because your name will
be included in the next payment schedule so there is no time for many
protocols.

Considering The category of your payment,you are required to forward your
bank account details for your payment to our offshore payment center where
we maintain an escrow account for foreign payments any moment you are
advised to do so but remember that you will be required to make a little
fluctuation marginal difference fee during the course of your transfer.
Regards,
Sergio Resendiz.
